item.title: Donovan add a quote by Frederick Buechner
item.description: "Listen. Your life is happening. You are happening. Think back on your journey. The music of your life..." -- Frederick Buechner

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Frederick Buechner
item.description: "Listen to your life. All moments are key moments." -- Frederick Buechner

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Frederick Buechner
item.description: "Wether you call on him or don't call on him, God will be present with you." -- Frederick Buechner

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Frederick Buechner
item.description: "The past is the place we view the present from as much as the other way around." -- Frederick Buechner

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Frederick Buechner
item.description: "This side of Nirvana, there is no such escape for any of us as far as I know." -- Frederick Buechner

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Frederick Buechner
item.description: "Here and there even in our world, and now and then, even in ourselves, we catch glimpeses of a New Creation, which, fleeting as those glipmses are apt to be, give us hope both for this life and for whatever life may await us later on." -- Frederick Buechner

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Frederick Buechner
item.description: "It is within the bonds of marriage that I, for one, found a greater freedom to be and to become and to share myself thatn I can imaine ever having found in any other kind of relationship." -- Frederick Buechner

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Shawn Achor
item.description: "..the more you believe in your own ability to success the more likely it is that you will." -- Shawn Achor

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Shawn Achor
item.description: "When we encounter an unexpected challenge of threat the only way to save ourselves is to hold on tight to the people around us and not let go." -- Shawn Achor

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Shawn Achor
item.description: "The best leaders are the ones who show their true colors not during the banner years but during times of struggle." -- Shawn Achor

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Shawn Achor
item.description: "Habits are like financial capital â€“ forming one today is an investment that will automatically give out returns for years to come." -- Shawn Achor

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Shawn Achor
item.description: "Each one of us is like that butterfly the Butterfly Effect . And each tiny move toward a more positive mindset can send ripples of positivity through our organizations our families and our communities." -- Shawn Achor

item.title: Donovan add a quote by N.D. Wilson
item.description: "Your life is your own, your glory is your glory, but you will lose it if you keep it for yourself. Grasp it for the sake of others..." -- N.D. Wilson

item.title: Donovan add a quote by N.D. Wilson
item.description: "Do you dislike your role in the story, your place in the shadow? What complaints do you have that the hobbits could not have heaved at Tolkien? You have been born into a narrative, you have been given freedom. Act, and act well until you reach your final scene." -- N.D. Wilson

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Graham Greene
item.description: "He knew now that at the end there was only one thing that counted - to be a saint." -- Graham Greene

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Joan Didion
item.description: "We tell ourselves stories in order to live." -- Joan Didion

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Joan Didion
item.description: "I know why we try to keep the dead alive: we try to keep them alive in order to keep them with us." -- Joan Didion

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Joan Didion
item.description: "Marriage is memory, marriage is time. Marriage is not only time: it is also, parodoxically, the denial of time." -- Joan Didion

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Steve Raimo
item.description: "Times are changing, and we must change with them. The twenty-first-century church does and will continually face radical change and much uncertainity with undefined problems that require organizatonal models and leadership qualities and competencies far different from those that were successful in the twentieth century." -- Steve Raimo

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Steve Raimo
item.description: "The church cannot separate itself from the world to which it is called. Churches that grasp the notion of being missional automatically function as an open boundaryless system. To them, the idea of breaking down external boundaries come naturally." -- Steve Raimo

item.title: Donovan add a quote by A.J. Jacobs
item.description: "I did get a colonic, but I've decided not write about it at length. I didn't find it helpful or enlightening. I can tell you want it felt like, though: It felt like someone shooting water up your butt." -- A.J. Jacobs

item.title: Donovan add a quote by A.J. Jacobs
item.description: "Cigarettes' cost far outweigh any resulting trimness, just as asphyxiation outweighs the benefits of stretching out the spine when you hang yourself from a shower curtain rod." -- A.J. Jacobs

item.title: Donovan add a quote by A.J. Jacobs
item.description: "The MRI has a repertoire of noises that resemble, in no particular order: a game-show buzzer for a wrong answer, urgent knocking, a modem from 1992, a grizzly-bear growl, and a man with a raspy voice shouting what sounds like "mother cooler!" -- A.J. Jacobs

item.title: Donovan add a quote by A.J. Jacobs
item.description: "After decimating several vegetables, I decide juicing is my favorite form of food preparation. There's something perversely appealing about subjecting an innocent plant to that much violence." -- A.J. Jacobs

item.title: Donovan add a quote by A.J. Jacobs
item.description: "The dehydrator blows warm air on your food for hours, sometimes days. It reminds me of the temperature and intensity of dog's breath. So imagine a German shepherd exhaling on your fruit for a weekend." -- A.J. Jacobs

item.title: Donovan add a quote by A.J. Jacobs
item.description: "So, if weight loss is your goal, and you have impressive self-control, raw food is something to consider." -- A.J. Jacobs

item.title: Donovan add a quote by A.J. Jacobs
item.description: "Step back for a minute. Pretend you're from Mars. From a coldly rational point of view, pedestrian helmets aren't a crazy idea." -- A.J. Jacobs

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "Hard times require furious dancing. Each of us is proof." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Robert Webber
item.description: "There is something explainable about what man has accomplished in God's creation, while the creation itself remains a mystery." -- Robert Webber

item.title: Donovan add a quote by Robert Webber
item.description: "God works through life, through people, and through physical, tangible, and material reality to communicate his healing presence in our lives." -- Robert Webber
